briefTitle: In-vivo Efficacy Study of Patient Pre-operative Preps
officialTitle: Assessment of the Antimicrobial Efficacy of 3M CHG/IPA Preoperative Skin Preparation Against Resident Human Skin Flora on the Abdominal and Inguinal Regions
conditions: Bacterial Reduction on Skin Flora Post-product Application

interventions.name: ChloraPrep Hi-Lite Orange
otherNames: Chlorhexidine gluconate 2% w/v / Isopropyl alcohol 70% v/v

interventions.name: 3M CHG/IPA Prep Tint 10.5-mL
otherNames: Chlorhexidine gluconate 2% w/v / Isopropyl alcohol 70% v/v

interventions.name: 3M CHG/IPA Prep Tint 26-mL
otherNames: Chlorhexidine gluconate 2% w/v / Isopropyl alcohol 70% v/v

summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the antimicrobial efficacy of the 3M CHG/IPA Prep on skin flora of the abdominal and inguinal regions of human subjects.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: baseline, 10 minutes post-product application and 6 hour post-product application
